title.rendered: Supporting PPN Incentives, Intiland Presents Intiland Sunshine Fair

content.rendered:
Jakarta (20/05) – The property development company PT Intiland Development Tbk (Intiland; DILD) has launched a property sales promotion program titled “Intiland Sunshine Fair.” This promotion, which runs from May to June 2024, provides a great opportunity for the public to own their dream property with special offers.

Intiland Sunshine Fair features 21 outstanding property projects offering a variety of property products, including landed houses, apartments, offices, and shophouses (SOHO), located in Jakarta, Tangerang, and Surabaya. These diverse property offerings aim to meet the varied needs of consumers seeking quality and affordable property solutions easily and advantageously.

Harto Laksono, Intiland’s Marketing Director for the Surabaya region, explained that the Intiland Sunshine Fair program is intended to boost customers’ purchasing power for property products, which is showing signs of improvement. The company observes that the public’s interest in buying or investing in property tends to grow along with increasing market confidence and domestic economic stability.

“Intiland Sunshine Fair is not merely a property exhibition; it is a manifestation of Intiland’s commitment to providing opportunities and ease for consumers to own our property products. This theme reflects confidence, optimism, and facilitates the process of owning property. It is as if bringing sunlight to illuminate the path to the dream home,” said Harto in a written statement on Monday, (20/05)

The Intiland Sunshine Fair offers numerous promotional deals for property purchases, including special discounts, prizes, and simplified purchasing processes. Consumers who purchase a property unit during this period have the opportunity to get discounts of up to 50% and win electric cars. Additionally, this program provides other exciting bonuses such as free furniture, electronic appliances, waived service charges, and shopping and dining vouchers worth tens of millions of Rupiah. 

According to Harto Laksono, this promotional program presents a favorable opportunity for consumers to acquire Intiland property products. The public benefits from the ease of purchasing property by leveraging the Government-Borne Value Added Tax (PPN DTP) incentive program. With the tagline “Beli Properti Impian Sekarang, Bebas PPN Sampai Juni,” the Company aims to stimulate public interest and capability for investment in the property sector. 

“The Value Added Tax (PPN DTP) incentive greatly helps the community in property purchases by reducing purchasing costs. We believe this policy will stimulate property market growth and provide broad economic benefits,” said Harto.

21 Outstanding Properties

Intiland Sunshine Fair presents 21 best properties consisting of 13 properties in Jakarta and Tangerang, as well as 8 properties in Surabaya. In Jakarta, consumers have the opportunity to choose from the best properties such as Fifty Seven Promenade, Regatta, 1Park Avenue, SQ Rés, as well as Serenia Hills, Brezza, Virya Semanan, 1Park Homes, and South Grove residences. Meanwhile, for property developments in Tangerang, the company provides Aeropolis Apartments, Talaga Bestari housing, Magnolia Residence, and commercial units in Ruota in Talaga Bestari.

Intiland also offers the 8 best properties in Surabaya, including landed houses, apartments, low-rise residences, offices, and commercial properties. These property developments consist of Graha Natura, Aurora SOHO Graha Natura, The Rosebay, Praxis apartments and offices, Sumatra36, Spazio Tower offices, Tierra SOHO Avenue, and commercial units in Plaza Segi 8.

Harto Laksono revealed that for the Intiland Sunshine Fair program, the company offers numerous promotions and purchasing conveniences across all projects. For landed house products, the company provides a variety of marketing gimmicks.

Purchasing a housing unit in the prestigious Lily by The Lake cluster, Graha Natura will receive a free administrative transfer of ownership fees and a free canopy. Free canopy facilities are also provided for buyers of house units in the Morning Glory cluster, Graha Natura, Surabaya.

Magnolia Residence in Tangerang offers special prices starting from Rp500 million and free PPN. Virya Semanan, a private cluster development in West Jakarta, also provides free PPN facilities for every unit purchase. Serenia Hills housing offers a 50% reduction in the Acquisition Duty of Right on Land and Building (BPHTB) for Quantum unit purchases, while South Grove located in Lebak Bulus, South Jakarta, offers special prices for specific units and lift installations worth Rp300 million.

Harto Laksono revealed that purchasing apartment units also comes with equally exciting promotions. Purchasing an SQ Rés apartment in Jakarta, for example, offers a chance to get discounts of up to Rp1 billion. Regatta apartments in Pluit, North Jakarta, offer free furniture bonuses, free PPN, branded interior promotions, and up to 15% discounts for show units.

In central Jakarta, Fifty Seven Promenade apartments offer furniture bonuses worth Rp200 million, a free one-year service charge, free PPN, and up to 23% discounts for specific units. Meanwhile, for the purchase of apartment units in Surabaya such as The Rosebay, Praxis Apartment, and Sumatra36, buyers will receive a 100% PPN-free incentive and a chance to get electric cars, shopping vouchers, interior vouchers worth Rp10 million, electronic vouchers worth Rp50 million, up to Apple iPhone Pro 15. Various attractive prizes can also be obtained in all Intiland property projects in the Surabaya area.

“The provision of gifts and purchase bonuses will vary for each property product. However, all promotional programs we prepare aim to facilitate consumers in owning the best Intiland properties,” he further stated.

The company also prepares special promotions for the purchase of commercial property units. Purchasing commercial units like Aurora SOHO Graha Natura and Tierra SOHO Avenue, for example, will receive business opening incentives of up to Rp100 million and free air conditioning units on each floor. Other attractive bonuses are given for the purchase of Plaza Segi 8 shophouse units, where upgrading the purchase of a 2 stories unit will receive 3 stories.

The company also offers special deals for the purchase of office units. Consumers who buy Spazio Tower office units will receive fully furnished facilities for free, while purchases of Praxis Office units will receive semi-furnished, air conditioning, and service charge for free.

Harto Laksono is optimistic that the Intiland Sunshine Fair program will receive a good response from the public. Apart from offering various attractive promotions, this program enlarges the opportunity for the public to easily, quickly, and profitably own properties.

“We launch Intiland Sunshine Fair as a form of appreciation for consumers and the community who have entrusted us all this time. Thanks to that trust, Intiland continues to grow into a better property developer and always prioritizes consumer satisfaction,” he expressed.

In addition to property purchase promotions, the company also organizes various activities for children and families to enliven the Intiland Sunshine Fair program. Some of these activities include Kid’s Painting, Kid’s Cooking Class, Happy Feat Zumba Fest, and Yoga. In Surabaya, the company also holds various activities such as fun walks and pop-up stores.

“We organize many exciting activities that can be participated in by the public and consumers with their families at selected properties in Jakarta, Tangerang, and Surabaya. We want to invite the public to come to the projects and directly experience the excellence of our properties,” said Harto Laksono.

The company believes that the Intiland Sunshine Fair program will run successfully. This program is designed to meet the desires of the public to own quality dream properties. With 45 years of experience in the property industry, Intiland ensures that each consumer receives the best property according to their needs.
